ygData.subject: Re: Choon, Froon, and the Runes
ygData.msgSnippet: Madagan, I take it that you are level 27.  If this is the case, forget about meleeing Choon and Froon -- pull them both and use your charm song to pit them
ygData.messageBody:
Madagan,

I take it that you are level 27. If this is the case, forget about
meleeing Choon and Froon -- pull them both and use your charm song to pit
them against each other. After one falls, recharm the winner, run a little
ways with pet following you, recharm, make him sit down, and run back and
speed loot the loser. If you have a caster with you, have them finish off
the second one as he's chasing you around.

Raiel Kendan
